settings.title: Propensity Score Matching
settings.description: Propensity score matching using logistic regression as scoring algorithm. Feature set contains all ICD and ATC codes with 3 digits as well as age and sex.

input.name: Observed patient concept
input.description: Drag a concept in here to select the patients you want to observe.

input.name: Evaluated treatment
input.description: Drag the treatment you want to evaluate in here
